casename: CDIB Venture Investment (Asia) Ltd v Soeryadjaya Edwin and Others and Another Suit
counsel: Rajiv Nair [Shook Lin & Bok] for the plaintiffs; K. Shanmugam SC, Valerie Tan and Christopher Tan [Allen & Gledhill] for the defendants
tags-parsed: Contract/"Put option" in sale and purchase agreement/Whether right to exercise put option depended on breach of warranty/Whether breach could be rectified or waived/Whether term could be implied that plaintiffs would not do anything to jeopardise the project/Conduct of plaintiffs/No implied term in the circumstances.
